short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark albums as listened or add them to a listening list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can mark albums as listened or you can add them to your listening list and listen to them later.
Supported Websites: albumoftheyear.org
